titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3025) to grant the consent of the Congress to the Appalachian States Low-Level radioactive Waste Compact.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-358.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/8/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3025 (Appalachian States Low-Level Radioactive Waste Compact).
